string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Whatever the mind can think and perceive, it can achieve.@Napoleon Hill
It doesn’t matter how slowly you go, as long as you don’t stop.@Confucious
What you do today can improve all of your tomorrows.@Ralph Marston
If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.@Napoleon Hill
You begin by always expecting good things to happen.@Tom Hopkins
It always seems impossible until it’s done.@Nelson Mandela
The most common way for people to give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.@Alice Walker
The trouble is, if you don’t risk anything, you risk more.@Erica Jong
People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.@Rob Siltanen
One’s finds limits by pushing them.@Herbert Simon
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.@Charles R. Swindoll
I am not a product of my circumstances, I am a product of my decisions.@Steven Covey
Challenges are gifts that force us to search for a new center of gravity. Don’t fight them. Just find a new way to stand.@Oprah Winfrey
To be successful, you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can’t just accept the ones you like.@Mike Gafka
Security is mostly a superstition. Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.@Helen Keller
Success isn’t about how much money you make, it’s about the difference you make in people’s lives.@Michelle Obama
Live as if you were to die tomorrow, learn as if you were to live forever.@Mahatma Gandi
The greatest danger for most of us is not that our aim is too high and we miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.@Michealangelo
I am not judged by the number of times I fail, but by the number of times I succeed.@Tom Hopkins
Power is not given to you, you have to take it.@Beyonce
Be humble, be hungry, and always be the hardest worker in the room.@Dwayne Johnson
Leaders set high standards. Refuse to tolerate mediocrity or poor performance.@Brian Tracy
Dream big and dream fierce.@Viola Davis
We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.@Maya Angelou
Don’t be afraid to give up the good for the great.@John D. Rockefeller
Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.@Johnathan Swift
Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.@John Wooden
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.@ Anais Nin
Leadership is the ability to get extraordinary achievement from ordinary people.@Brian Tracy
Love your enemies because they tell you all your faults.@Benjamin Franklin
Dream is not the thing you see in sleep, but it is that thing that doesn’t let you sleep.@Dr. Abdul Kalam
If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.@Oprah Winfrey
I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not the one who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.@Nelson Mandela
Remember, no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.@Eleanor Rosevelt
Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.@Robert Kiyosaki
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.@H. Jackson Brown Jr.
With drive and a little talent, you can move mountains.@Dwayne Johnson
There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.@C.S. Lewis
Creativity is intelligence having fun.@Albert Einstein
You will never find time for anything. If you want time, you must make it.@Charles Burton
You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.@Margaret Thatcher
Courage is like a muscle, we strengthen it by use.@Ruth Gordo
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.@Vince Lombardi
Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.@Theodore Roosevelt
Either you run the day, or the day runs you.@Jim Rohn
Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.@Ingrid Bergman
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.@Helen Keller
Action is the foundational key to all success.@Pablo Picasso
Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.@Victor Hugo
You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.@Maya Angelou
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.@Helen Keller
Becoming is better than being.@Herman Melville
Hardships often prepare ordinary people for extraordinary destiny.@C.S. Lewis
Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness than any other.@Brian Tracy
If you want to be successful in this world, you have to follow your passion, not a paycheck.@Jen Welter
I find that the harder I work, the more success I seem to have.@Thomas Jefferson
Success is not final and failure is not fatal. It is the courage to continue that counts.@Winston Churchill
If it is important to you, you will find a way, not an excuse.@Ryan Blair
Leadership is an action, not a position.@Donald McGannon
There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.@Brian Tracy
When the well is dry, we know the worth of water.@Benjamin Franklin
The starting point of all achievement is desire.@Napoleon Hill
Failure is the key to success, each mistake teaches us something.@Morihei Ueshiba
If you wait, all that happens is you get older.@Larry McMurtry
If you give up on your dreams, what’s left?@Jim Carrey
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.@Wayne Gretzky - Michael Scott
We only fail when we stop learning.@Steve Krivda
How dare you settle for less when the world has made it so easy for you to be remarkable.@Seth Godin
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.@Arthur Ashe
If everything seems under control, you’re not going fast enough.@Mario Andretti
Energy and persistence conquer all things.@Benjamin Franklin
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.@Steve Jobs
The secret to change is not on fighting the old, but on building the new.@Socrates
We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.@Ronald Reagan
A ship is always safe at shore, but that is not what it’s built for.@Albert Einstein
The greatest glory lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.@Nelson Mandela
Remember sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.@Dalai Lama
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.@Mark Twain
Do or do not, there is no try.@Yoda
Often any decision, even the wrong decision is better than no decision.@Ben Horwitz
Hard times do not create heroes. It is during the hard times when the hero within us is revealed.@Bob Riley
Success is walking from failure to failure without any loss of enthusiasm.@Winston Churchill
If you spend your life trying to be good at everything, you will never be great at anything.@Tom Rath
If you cannot outplay them, outwork them.@Ben Hogan
You just can’t beat the person who never gives up.@Babe Ruth
Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.@Dale Carnegie
Challenge yourself. It’s the only path to growth.@Morgan Freeman
To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.@John Wooden
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.@William James
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.@Henry Ford
Not until we are lost do we begin to truly find ourselves.@Henry David Thoreau
If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.@Milton Berle
If something is wrong, fix it now. But train yourself not to worry, worry fixes nothing.@Ernest Hemingway
Well done is better than well said.@Ben Franklin
It’s always too early to quit.@Norman Vincent Peale
There will be obstacles, there will be doubters, there will be mistakes, but with hard work, there are no limits.@Michael Phelps
Dream as if you’ll live forever, live as if you’ll die today.@James Dean
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.@Will Rodgers
Fear is going to be a player in your life, but you get to decide how much.@Jim Carrey
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.@Anne Frank
When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.@Helen Keller
The future depends on what you do today.@Mahatma Gandhi
If you light a lamp for someone else, it will also brighten your path.@Buddha
It’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.@Abraham Lincoln
Forget about the fast lane. If you really want to fly, just harness your power to your passion.@Oprah Winfrey
There is only one way to avoid criticism. Do nothing. Be nothing. Say nothing.@Aristotle
Every mountain top is within your reach if you just keep climbing.@Harry Finlay
Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory.@Dr. Suess
Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.@Salvador Dali
Those who don’t believe in magic will never find it.@Roald Dahl
It is never too late to be what you might have been.@George Eliot
If you aren’t sincere with it, you shouldn’t say anything at all.@Dr. Dre
Life is about making an impact, not making an income.@Kevin Kruse
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.@Florence Nightingale
We become what we think about.@Earl Nightingale
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.@Mark Twain
If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.@Latin Proverb
Dream big and dare to fail.@Norman Vaughan
Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.@Grandma Moses
If you can dream it, you can achieve it.@Zig Ziglar
Life is trying things to see if they work.@Ray Bradbury
Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.@Ralph Waldo Emerson
Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.@Babe Ruth
A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.@Jim Morrison
Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.@George S. Patton
The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.@Ayn Rand
The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.@Thomas A. Edison
Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.@George Bernard Shaw
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.@Lao Tzu
The best way out is always through.@Robern Frost
Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.@John F. Kennedy
If you want to be happy, be.@Leo Tolstoy
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.@Gandhi
The power of imagination makes us infinite.@John Muir
Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.@Harriet Tubman
